author: wmtan
body:
A few  weeks ago, Giacomo Govi removed serialization based on ROOT from this file in 7_5_X.
Unfortunately, this change got lost in CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X because of reasons not fully understood
(most likely a merge issue).  The changes got lost in Serialization.cc, but not in Serialization.h.
This inconsistency is causing fatal compilation errors in package CondCore/CondDB in
CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X.
This PR restores Giacomo's changes, and fixes the build errors.  Incidentally, this PR makes this file identical in CMSSW_7_5_X and CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X.
title: Removed serialization based on Root, since it is not used. (again).
